summary: Previously unreleased material outlines the campaign against Bill Clinton's presidency, from his days in Arkansas up to his impeachment trial.
cast: Morgan Freeman|Jonathan Alter|Steve Barnes|Paul Begala|Richard Ben-Veniste|Robert S. Bennett|Carl Bernstein|Sidney Blumenthal|Max Brantley|David Brock|Dale Bumpers|Joe Cammerata|John Camp|Susan Carpenter-McMillan|James Carville|Larry Case|Paula Casey|Bill Clinton|Hillary Clinton|Joe Conason|George Conway|Andrew Cooper|Ann Coulter|Gil Davis|Parker Dozhier|Ernie Dumas|Jerry Falwell|Danny Ferguson|Robert Fiske|Gennifer Flowers|Vince Foster|Mike Gauldin|Richard Gephardt|David Hale|Everett Ham|Steny H. Hoyer|Cliff Jackson|Paula Jones|David Kendall|Howard Kurtz|Monica Lewinsky|Gene Lyons|Jerome Marcus|Bobby McDaniel|Jim McDougal|Susan McDougal|Dan Moldea|Sheffield Nelson|Larry Nichols|Richard Nixon|Ted Olson|Robert Parry|Larry Patterson|Roger Perry|Richard Porter|William Rempel|Janet Reno|Bob C. Riley|Claudia Riley|Richard Mellon Scaife|Ken Starr|Jeffrey Toobin|Jim Guy Tucker|Bill Watt|John W. Whitehead|Bob Woodward|Betsy Wright|Newt Gingrich|Henry Kissinger|Tim Russert
title: The Hunting of the President
